name: Outside Parties
description: Outside Parties is a “hidden picture”/“hidden object”-style horror scavenger hunt, coming to Playdate.

name: Empire
description: This turn-based game aims at short sessions and can be played up to 6 players on the same playdate!

name: Dolphin Splash!
description: Take control of an aquatic creature and race, jump and dive, (deep) within (and above) the water.

name: Eventyr
description: Sin descripción

name: Playdle
description: Sin descripción

name: Ball und Panzer Golf
description: Sin descripción

name: Shark Turtle
description: Sin descripción

name: Thoru Yamamoto's Mole Hole
description: Sin descripción

name: Yoyozo
description: Use your space yoyo to collect stars with style.

name: One to Nine
description: A puzzle game - fill the board with the same number.

name: HatTrick Beginnings
description: Sin descripción

name: Spacey-Clopedia
description: Sin descripción

name: Owlet's Embrace
description:
An owlet afraid of flight sets off to explore a vibrant mysterious world and rediscover itself. On this heartwarming adventure, you'll confront the owlet's deepest fears as only the greatest challenges can lead to the most profound growth.

Owlet's Embrace is an action exploration platformer, blending fast paced grappling hook manouvers with combat and emotional discovery.

name: Super Agent
description: Sin descripción

name: Astral Alliance
description: Astral Alliance is a space themed real-time strategy game that pits you against a hostile enemy invasion.

name: Elite Soldier: Modern Gun Shooter and Tank Combat
description:
Action 3D modern shooter, or FPS (First Person Shooter), frenetic gun combat in the battlefield, crossfire, with varied arsenal of weapons and guns, next-gen 3D graphics (with the quality of consoles and PC games), frenetic action and insane gameplay: battle of tanks in realistics battlefields, attack helicopters, infiltration missions, hand and weapon/gun combat, and more!

Kerpen Studios proudly announces its first FPS shooter (first person shooter) in years: Black Operation. Black Operations (or black ops) are covert military operations. Your mission is to infiltrate in a foreign military intervention zone and to complete all objectives with the precision of a elite soldier. It's your mission, failure is not an option!

name: Mortal Kombat 1
description: It’s In Our Blood! Discover a reborn Mortal Kombat Universe created by the Fire God Liu Kang. Mortal Kombat 1 ushers in a new era of the iconic franchise with a new fighting system, game modes, and fatalities!

name: Deceive Inc.: Of Queens and Kings
description:
New Agent, Octo: meet the boisterous super-hacker, Octo!
New Private Lobbies: Players now have the ability to facilitate their own private matches!
Catalogs from Seasons 1 & 2 will remain permanently completable!
New Map, Operation Sound Eclipse: Stop a powerful EMP super-weapon on a high stakes mission in a futuristic space opera
New Store Items & Premium Catalog Available: New legendary skins, poses, and inks for gadgets and weapons
Quality of Life Improvements: Additional improvements have been made based on community feedback

name: Wander in Wonder
description:
This work is an interactive animation piece on the adventures of a lost little rabbit wandering through the woods.
As night draws near, wonder-working plants and flowers show the way.

name: Ding Dong Dead
description: "A slasher horror game where the player's decisions matter. Babysit Rex, invite others, order pizza, survive the murderous Ripper, or give it to your dark side. The choices are yours."

name: Tech-Heresy
description: This is a heavily edited version of Technobabble Heresy, a map I made for the Radio Free Gehenna community project.

name: Veil of Darkness
description: In a world shrouded in darkness, where the forces of evil hold dominion, one hero must rise to the challenge.Prepare for an epic journey into the heart of darkness with 'Hexen: Veil of Darkness' - a fresh and fiendish hub adventure utilising the power of GZDoom's Hardware mode. In this corner of Cronos, a shadowy sorceress, the notorious and macabre Mistress Nox, has acquired the Chaos Sphere. With its dark power at her disposal, she's been busy building an army of abominations, casting the world into eternal twilight. You are the chosen one, a hero marked by the Gods themselves. Your divine quest? Venture through treacherous swamps, delve deep into haunted forests, explore creepy castles and dungeons, and ultimately unlock the enigmatic portal to the Shadow Realm.

name: Iconoclasm
description: A simple short heretic map.

name: Super Slug
description: Responding to a distress signal from a nearby planet, your ship detects no lifeforms, but sensors are picking up energy readings near an abandoned research facility. You are sent down with your away team as chief of security to investigate. Upon arrival, you are alone, there's no sign of your team, and your equipment is gone.

name: Lycans
description: Lycans is a multiplayer game up to 10 players. Investigate during the day to find the hidden werewolves among the villagers and hide at night to survive their attacks!

name: Nuclear Bowls
description: Sin descripción

name: Paparazi
description: How would you like to be pursued relentlessly with no recourse -- chased without the ability to elude your stalkers? If your answer to this question is "yes" then we think you need serious counseling. Want to "test the waters" and get some idea of what it is like? Download Paparazi and find out for yourself!

name: Star Bowls
description:
Screen after screen our little character will encounter a lot of different enemies ready to make mincemeat out of him. To defend himself from them he has a laser that turns the bad guys into energy particles, but unfortunately he will not have any rest because even if he manages to eliminate them all, they will continue to appear incessantly.

Our main mission and difficulty will be to find all the elements scattered around the scenery, -some hidden, others in plain sight- to avoid the catastrophe that would imply the destruction of the space base.

name: Sicko Sanctum
description: Sicko Sanctum is a score-attack boomer shooter hybrid that owns character action merchandise. Snag upgrades and some skill, keep battlin' till you get a high score that makes you feel like you've had just a neat little time playing the game :)

name: Chess Housers
description: Updated release published in 1993 which added VGA suppport.

name: Marvel's Spider-Man 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Edition includes:
- Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 full game for PS5.
- 10 unique suits (five each for Peter and Miles).
- Additional Photo Mode items.
- +2 Skill Points.

name: Sicko Sanctum: Megahecks
description: An infinite, wave-based, movement shooter that takes place in a surreal code hell. Your objective: get revenge and go beyond. With the use of unlimited upgrades, it looks easy on the surface. But with harder-than-ever enemies, special stages, and now a final boss, it's a tough time!

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Aru Witch Hunter no Shuzai Tape
description: An extra arc bundled in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku where a Witch Hunter tries to learn the method behind Kinzo Ushiromiya's wealth.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Arigato for 556
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa tells the story of a recently arrived recruit named Chiester 556 who loves thanking everybody.

name: BigChadGuys
description: BigChadGuys Plus Plus is a unique Cobblemon experience that blends the worlds of Minecraft and Pokemon. The mod pack offers a wide range of new content and features, including improved combat mechanics, revamped farming, new decoration blocks, and custom world generation with unique biomes, structures, and Pokemon. The mod pack also prioritizes performance improvements to ensure seamless gameplay. BigChadGuys Plus Plus is a must-try for players looking for a fresh and engaging experience.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Beatrice no White Day
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa tells the story of The Seven Sisters of Purgatory, who all expect to receive gifts from those they gave chocolates to, but Beatrice plans to ruin the holiday after feeling left out.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Shinjin Shisai Cornelia
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa tells the story of Cornelia, who is excited to get recruited into the Great Court of Heaven, but the workplace atmosphere is not quite what she expected.

name: Hayven Celestia: Under One Sky
description: A lone hero must unite friend and foe in this Sci-fi Rock Opera Visual Novel

name: Jiji Mago: Old & Young RPG mini
description:
JIJImago(old & young)RPGmini is a short JRPG game made in Wolf RPG Editor. Created with retro four-color ascetics, JIJImago follows the adventure of an old man (Jii-san) and a young girl (Mago),

While this game is the third in the series, it can be played independently.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Gisho no.XXX
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Hane where Battler Ushiromiya returns to Rokkenjima after a six-year absence, but instead of having a friendly reunion with his family, he has plans of murder.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Game Master Battler!
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa, where after finding the truth and becoming Game Master, Battler tries to write a scenario for the next episode. As Game Master, Battler can do anything, and many people are more than willing to secure a role.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Mahou ni Tsuite no Juuyou Jikou
description: An extra arc that is a discussion between Beatrice and Maria about the importance of magic.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Jessica to Satsujin Senpuuki
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Hane where Jessica writes a play and shows it off to Battler and Shannon when Lambdadelta interferes and sucks the three of them into it. The trio must see the story to the end if they want to escape alive.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Jessica to Koi no Omajinai
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa, where Jessica seeks the help of Zepar and Furfur once again, and this time she receives a book of spells.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Jessica no Haha no Hi Present
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko When They Cry Tsubasa where Jessica summons Zepar and Furfur to help her get a present for Natsuhi, and the results are not quite what she expected.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Kinrou Kansha no Hi no Okurimono
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where the cousins all pick out gifts to give to their parents for Labor Thanksgiving Day, but Beatrice uses her powers to sow chaos.

name: 400 Miles
description: 1 player arcade racing game.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Last Note of the Golden Witch
description: An extra arc originally included in the PC release of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku where Battler, Ange, and Beatrice are summoned to challenge a new opponent, Piece, who assembles a new game board and asks them to figure out her identity.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Shoukanshi Kara no Tegami
description: An extra arc explaining the basics of magic.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Bern no Tegami
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Bernkastel writes to a friend about the rules of Beatrice's game.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 06: The Haunting
description:
Prepare for frightening thrills, the shambling undead, squad hunts to take down grotesque monsters, and those infamous jump-scares as The Haunting returns to Call of Duty! The Hellmouth has opened, spilling unearthly creatures from the underworld, and a creeping terror is slowly swallowing all souls as it infects the entirety of Al Mazrah, reaching the bloodred canals of Vondel, and beyond!

It appears a clandestine group known as the Dark Ritual Operators have located and opened a terrifying Hellmouth. After the gate’s seals were ripped apart, a cacophony of otherworldly gurgling resounded, before a veritable panoply of the grotesque poured forth from their opened prison…

All Operators should ready themselves for “Operation Nightmare” and prepare to battle and repel these aberrant threats!

Fortunately, in the ensuing chaos, the Dark Ritual Operators left the gate open in time for backup to arrive in the form of Spawn, the hellacious antihero who is now tasked with sending these monsters and their ilk back to the underworld.

The Haunting event officially begins at mid-season, bringing Halloween-themed maps, modes, events and more across both games. Prepare for spine-chilling scares and ferocious battles ahead at launch with the release of four new Multiplayer maps, a Battle Pass stocked with devilishly entertaining new Operators and Weapon Blueprints, and more.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Memoirs of the ΛΔ
description: An extra arc originally included in the PC release of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku where Lambdadelta talks about the wishes she’s granted, remembering in particular the wishes of some certain little kids.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Aru Ryourinin no Zakki
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Gohda tells of the time he first signed on to serve the Ushiromiya family and the strange events he witnessed.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Warera no Kokuhaku
description: An extra arc originally included in the PC release of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku, which demonstrates the creation of a new game board of Beatrice's from the ground up, showing readers how the mystery is set up and how fantasy elements are used to adorn the tale.

name: Kisaragi Gold Star: Nonstop Go Go!!
description: Kisaragi Gold * Star: Nonstop Go Go!! is a Visual Novel video game, developed by Saga Planets and published by Piacci, which was released in Japan in 2013.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Sakutaro, Rengoku-san he
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Sakutaro is taken away from Maria and sent to Purgatory, where he must purify his sins if he wishes to reunite with her.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Tenshi 17-sai Higashi-shi - 44a
description: An extra arc featuring Ange and Virgilia creating new pairings for their yaoi doujins.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Nana Shimai no Valentine
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Ronove bakes chocolate for Valentine's Day and the Seven Sisters of Purgatory seek out recipients for it.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Valentine Paper
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Battler receives letters from various characters for Valentine’s Day.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Dare no Ochakai?
description: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Bernkastel is invited to a tea party hosted by Lambdadelta and Featherine, but traps abound.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Majo-tachi no Tanabata ha Amakunai
description: Sin descripción
Sin descripción

name: 1943: The Battle of Midway
description: Sin descripción

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Into the Storm
description:
What is Into the Storm? It's a modified version of PvZ2 with the main selling point of fast-paced actions. In fact, if we were to consider the original game as well, then this would be what PvZ Brutal is to the main game. And this is a forewarning response: Zombie in this mod spawns at a excruciatingly alarming rate, more than enough to overwhelm you.

Other than just the action, mechanics have been removed, tweaked or even reworked to serve various purposes. Plant Food as well as level-up system for plants are no longer in the game, leaving any subsequent mechanics associated with such to behave differently. All upgrades, plants and sprouts are purchasable with in-game currency, eliminating the predatory microtransaction tactic.

name: Topple Tactics
description: Topple Tactics is a physics-based multiplayer tower defense game where one huge player places towers whilst the little players must get to the end of the map in order to defeat the huge player!

name: Cube
description: This is a computerized version of the classic "Rubik's Cube" puzzle game created by Doug Cox. The object is to rotate the sections of the cube to move the colored squares so that each side of the cube contains only squares of the same color. As you might expect, it's a bit more difficult to play on a computer screen, since the game requires frequent rotation of the cube, also there is only keyboard control. So in order to have success at this game, you'll need good spatial conceptual abilities as well as a good memory and a lot of patience.

name: Kurushi Final: Mental Blocks
description:
Kurushi Final: Mental Blocks originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.
Dare you test your intelligence against a higher power? Featuring nine mind-stretching stages, plus a two player survival mode, 100 additional challenges and a custom-puzzle generator, Kurushi Final: Mental Blocks remains to this day a supreme test of mental and physical agility.

name: Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny
description:
Experience Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny originally released on the PSP (PlayStationPortable) system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.
The Soulcalibur series is a weapon-based fighting game in which characters wage battle with a variety of unique weapons.
Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny features the original Gauntlet mode, where players go on an adventure with the characters of Soulcalibur while clearing various missions along the way. The missions are a great way to pick up battle knowledge, techniques, and improve your skills while having fun.

name: Tekken 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Video Poker
description: Sin descripción

name: Skull Dash
description:
This Halloween night, when darkness falls and the eerie howls of the wind are heard, we offer a unique entertainment experience for you and your friends.
Skull Dash: Ghost Master offers you an adventure filled with 8 separate horror-themed mini-games. All games contain different tasks. Try to reach the highest score by using your reflexes.

name: Deep Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Ape Escape Academy
description: To become an expert in monkey business, you first have to go to monkey school, so enroll now at the craziest college the world has ever seen. You can work your way up through the school years by winning wacky mini-games but keep an eye on your classmates – students they may be, but when it comes to trouble and tomfoolery, these goofy monkeys are pros!

name: Gift Wrapped
description: Find your selected gift amongst the pile of other presents in this time waster.

name: The Sims 4 Halloween Bundle
description: Transform your Sims and their homes for Halloween with The Sims 4 Werewolves Game Pack, The Sims 4 Vampires Game Pack, and The Sims 4 Spooky Stuff Pack.

name: We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie - Katamari Damacy Series Music Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Callisto Protocol: Riot Bundle
description: Experience the Riot Bundle, featuring the all-new Riot Mode, new animations showcasing lethal kills, and an exciting new cosmetic collection.

name: Pride Quiz
description: Improve your LGBTQIA+ knowledge! There are four options but only one is the correct. Can you improve your score?

name: Wordscapes Search
description: Connect letters to find every word on the board and sail through thousands of classic puzzle levels set against stunning nature backgrounds.

name: Illegal Mahjong
description: Yuri, the former heiress of a company, finds her father's business bankrupt. To repay the debts, Yuri must compete in mahjong and continue to win. Can Yuri truly defeat her formidable opponents?

name: Mystic Valley Battleground
description: Valley Battlefield is a casual adventure game where you explore various monsters or events to gain equipment and skills. By strategically upgrading equipment and matching skills, improving one's own attributes, defeating a powerful boss to achieve ultimate victory!

name: Spooky Town
description: Spooky Town is a top-down corner Roguelike spell building game that utilizes various spells to create unimaginable spell effects, with ultra high degrees of freedom even for developers.

name: Vinecard
description: A Roguelike game with action card style. Explore divine weapons on the Kochab Star, slay demons and eliminate demons, solve mechanism puzzles, and cultivate to the pinnacle of perfection.

name: WFD
description: Oh no! The slimes are ruining the crops! Let's defend the field with the water gun! Watergun Farming Defense!

name: Treachery in Beatdown City: U.N. Trouble
description: Master the art of the Presidential Fist! Play as Blake Orama dropped off one block from the UN and fight through breakdancing president mascots, election deniers, werewolf loving athletes, and MORE with fireballs, spinning kicks and “Centrist Uppercuts”!

name: Tube Be Continued
description: Prepare for a tube-based, puzzle-filled, HAM-PACKED VR adventure with our charismatic hamster leader: The BOSS. Here at TUBE Industries we provide the puzzles, and you provide… the brains. No shady business here!

name: Ultimate Tower Defense
description: "Ultimate Tower Defense" is a thrilling and challenging game that puts your strategic skills to the test.

name: Umbra Fields
description: A Black and White Choose Your Own Adventure game in the Open World of the Umbra Fields. Customize who you are between 13 distinct classes, choose what nation you wish to be in, and explore to your heart's content. Do quests, explore dungeons, fight, and discover your fate, and the fate of the world.

name: Venus Puzzles
description: Come explore a unique world of beautiful women, unleash your puzzle solving skills, collect the most fascinating artworks, and enjoy endless enjoyment.

name: Tuk Tuk Taxi
description: Tuk Tuk Taxi is an exciting game that lets you experience the thrill of being a tuk tuk driver in a bustling city.

name: They Are Coming
description: They Are Coming is a hybrid game that combines roguelike, tower defense, and base building in a side-scrolling shooter format. It offers a straightforward gaming experience for pure enjoyment.

name: Threshold of Awakening
description: In 1960s USA, Jane Ferguson, a New York restaurant owner, receives an information on her CIA agent husband Mark, who had vanished mysteriously during a Tibet mission. To uncover his hidden secrets, she follows his trail, delving into the enigma of his disappearance.

name: The Hotel: Floor 13
description: You've just stepped out of an erratic elevator into the eerily silent reception of a hotel floor that shouldn't exist. The neon lights flicker, casting long, ominous shadows, and the décor screams 1980s – an atmosphere frozen in time, filled with an unsettling nostalgia.

name: The Show is Over It
description: The Show is Over It is a challenging platform game with caricatured characters. Players must climb levels filled with quirky obstacles and surprises These unexpected events add excitement to the game.

name: Toad Tales
description: "Toad tales" is a brutal mix of turn-based tactics and roguelike with RPG elements. You will encounter many different enemies, traps and dangers on your path to greatness. But being the greatest wouldn't make any sense without a challenge, would it?

name: SkateNationXL
description: Get ready to dive into a realistic skateboarding adventure! Explore skateparks, urban landscapes, and iconic spots. User-friendly controls, advanced tricks, and a rewarding progression system for the ultimate skateboarding experience. Stay tuned for updates!

name: Sligga Trigger
description: Suit up and sling some shells at sadistic, superpowered sci-fi slugs. Snag some secrets, suffer some shrapnel, and shoot the shit out of some Sliggas in this one-of-a-kind twin-stick shooter.

name: Solcialists
description: Solcialists is The Ultimate Operating System for the best Solcialists control experience. Mars 2066.

name: The Good Overlord
description: You're the guardian of the realm's most feared dungeon, now aiding heroes. 'The Good Overlord' is a Roguelike Bag-Builder with monsters, traps, and secrets. Defeat enemies, collect relics, and uncover the reason behind the Overlord's benevolence.

name: SuiCats
description: SuiCats is an engaging puzzle game where you combine kittens to create amazing cat cascades. Diverse physics and a humorous design will keep you smiling while playing SuiCats. Join the feline adventure and break the high score today!

name: Skull Island: Rise of Kong - Colossal Pack
description: Embark on a quest to avenge the death of your parents at the hands of the alpha predator: Gaw. This pack includes 8 exclusive film grains including a black and white noir filter, 8 Kong style variants , an exclusive boss-rush game mode, and a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the game

name: Voxlands
description: Explore gorgeous raytraced voxel lands, meet the local mutated wild-life, find out what went wrong, and quest, craft, loot, build, destroy and shoot your way to the top of the foodchain! Play alone, or with friends! Assuming you know how to share..

name: Rush
description: This is a competitive game with exquisite art style and a relaxed and enjoyable experience.

name: Shotgun Recovery
description: A psychological shooter set in a small Nordic town. Take part in robberies, drive-bys and self-medication, all while fighting literal nightmares to survive.

name: Santa's Gift Grab
description: Step into a snowy world with our straightforward collector's game. Featuring clean low-poly graphics and soothing Christmas tunes, your task is to help Santa gather his misplaced gifts. But be quick!

name: Sangi
description: A fast paced and combat oriented 2D platformer. Use multiple weapons and create multiple elemental reactions to efficiently eliminate your enemies. Experience a short story about your origins and try getting the best score possible in the arcade mode.

name: Sailaway III
description: Sailing simulation. Explore the world's oceans or compete in races in the most realistic sailing simulator available. The sailing waters are as big as the real world and circumnavigation will take several months. True weather, true conditions and true sail trim.

name: Sacabambaspis Chronicle
description: As a player, you become Sacabambaspis and live each day with your fellow Sacabambaspis, growing and evolving by swimming in the sea and eating plankton. Progress through the story with your companions in Sacabambaspis, and see what happens in the end.

name: Rulers of Aden
description: A fantasy turn-based indie rpg with character customization and enemies that may leave you struggling.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Haunted Halloween
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Halloween themed table with a focus on gimmicks, randomness and a center play-field spinner! Perfect for the Spooky at heart!

name: Rogue Tactics
description: Rogue Tactics is a turn-based strategy game with RPG elements. Fight, learn new spells, recruit new creatures into your squad and improve them.

name: Pixel Puzzles WW2 Jigsaw: Battle of Leyte
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Renovation Plan
description: This is a relaxing and leisurely home decoration game, you need to follow the design map to put all kinds of furniture in the corresponding position. Each room has unique furniture and decoration style, more gorgeous large apartment waiting for you to decorate.

name: Midnight Run
description: Midnight Run is a game where you, the player, is on a mission to get late night snacks for your friend. However, just because it seems like a simple quest to fulfill, the city has a bunch of weird things that happens to you along the way.

name: Methods: The Illusion Murders
description: Detective Red July must stop a serial killer who patterns his murders after optical illusions in this mystery visual novel set in the world of Methods.

name: Nightwatch
description: Nightwatch is a first person mystery game that plays out in the woods of Rivertidecreek. A walking simulator that features choices of dialogues and different puzzles. The artwork will make you feel absorbed in the game.

name: Soulmask
description: Soulmask is a sandbox game that prioritizes an authentic survival experience. As the "last one" blessed with the mysterious mask, players will grapple for survival in a primitive land steeped in mysterious faiths, carving out a path to ascendance. Start from nothing, explore, build, recruit tribesmen to fortify your clan, and ultimately unravel the mysterious truths hidden behind the civilizations of this world.

name: My Academy's Special Place
description: Our hero's homeroom teacher is also his big sister, Yaeka. She's popular with the students, but at home, she's a slobbish drunk. There's Maika, an exchange student and Akiba nerd. She's always asking him to go to Akiba with her. But Maika is told to return home. Two love stories are about to begin!

name: Money Transporter
description: "Money Transporter" is an intense game that puts you in charge of transporting money safely from the bank to the ATM and back.

name: Moci Over It
description: Use simple controls to control "moci" and reach the summit. Climbing is the accumulation of the past, much like life. Here is the future waiting to be piled up for you and the life of moci. Please join us in reaching the summit.

name: Mortisomem
description: Donald Barnes is a successful merchant who one day on his way home, starts being stalked by a dangerous demon from the Colonial Times. Now he has to find a way back home or finally defeat Mortisomem.

name: Outminer
description: Disaster strikes as you're about to complete your most important mission as a captain, forcing your crew and you to adapt to the harsh environment of a forsaken planet. Do you have what it takes to make it out alive?

name: Phosfi
description: Phosfi is an atmospheric, metroidvania style action-platformer. Explore and fight your way through a dark and dangerous coastal world full of mysteries and ancient treasures. Discover long buried temples and fend off Eldritch monstrosities in this beautiful 2D hand drawn and animated adventure.

name: Penguin Hatchery
description: Penguin Hatchery is a game about hatching penguins. Yeah thats pretty much it. With the help of some clicking and some random things that sometimes make sense sometimes don't you can begin to hatch penguin eggs and eventually hatch them at an insane rate!

name: Paradise Road
description: There are too many enemies waiting for you, can you excellently complete the challenge.

name: My Little Pony: Party of One
description: Who throws better parties than Pinkie Pie? Having just finished one celebration, Pinkie Pie sets off to invite all of her favorite ponies to a brand new party, but suddenly every pony seems to be quite busy. What’s going on? Join the investigation as Pinkie Pie visits her My Little Pony friends looking for clues.

name: Maze Quest Master: Cyclist
description: "Embark on a thrilling journey in 'Maze Quest Master - Cyclist.' Conquer intricate mazes, collect coins, and master wall-bound movement. Become the ultimate maze explorer!"

name: Lost Chapter: With You
description: Venture into the abyss once again to find out the protagonist's true identity! This DLC comes with new card system, bosses, events and many more!

name: LineMaze
description: LineMaze is one of the most creative puzzle game for your brain. This brain-stimulating puzzle game, very simple, and enjoyable for all ages.

name: Love Alone Death
description: Build relationship with the characters. Your choices might earn you favor from one character, but disdain from another. Use items to solve problems. Confront various endings. Choose one person and face the end with them.

name: Luna's Light
description: Luna's Light is the story of a young huntress who must leave her village and face a cruel post-apoclyptic world. Explore various biomes, find upgrades, fight bosses and complete quests.

name: Kittens with Cannons: Prelude
description: An action-RPG where you control a squad of gun-wielding cats! Complete quests, aid kitizens, and blast your way through the robot army!

name: Kingless Pawns
description: Kingless Pawns is a turn-based strategy Game with rogue-like elements. Personalize, Equip and Upgrade your Pawn in order to Defeat the Evil King.

name: House Master
description: Have you ever dreamed of what it would be like to build your own house? Or maybe just your own gazebo, shed, or outdoor fireplace? What would it look like, and how much could it cost? The House Master will answer all these questions and more!

name: Haunted Hotel: Pheonix
description: Uncover the truth behind the legendary fire that destroyed a university.

name: Halloween Again
description: Step into a world teeming with anticipation, and join us for a hair-raising adventure.

name: Hotel Renovator: Indoor Garden Room & Furniture Set
description: Escape the daily rush and immerse yourself in a lush, tranquil oasis with our Indoor Garden Room & Furniture Set. Turn your hotel room into a nature lover's paradise!

name: Mercenary Warriors
description: Mercenary Warriors is a Turn Based PVP Strategy Game set in a fantasy world. Create your own team selecting 9 of the multiple warriors available to you and rise to the top.

name: Pulsar
description: Pulsar is a VR shooter that combines procedural generation with your music. Built in audio analysis will challenge your reflexes and accuracy with dynamic game play and visual effects. Key Features: in-game file browser and audio analysis 10 different worlds 2 game modes Weapon customization

name: Godly Survivors
description: Face thousands of lost souls in the arena of the gods! Godly Survivors invites you to embark on an epic journey through an action rogue-lite game where you will hunt down the mobs' souls to improve your skills and survive the trial of the gods.

name: Ghost Hunters
description: Ghost Hunters is a cooperative horror game. In which you play as one of 4 ghostbusters. You choose a contract / house where the hell is going on, and you and your team will have to deal with it.

name: Eye of the Void: Unleashed
description: The goblin tribes of the realm have united against you and the power of the Eye of the Void. Build towers, fortify walls, construct gold mines to gather resources, and cast powerful spells to fend off waves of determined goblins and their allies who seek to destroy you.

name: Failure to Launch
description: SIMULTANEOUSLY complete whacky minigames while piloting a spaceship through an endless runner of difficult obstacles. Fail a minigame or hit an object and your ship will meet a FIERY EXPLOSION. Are you skilled enough to fly while also finishing minigames? Prepare to LAUNCH INTO FAILURE

name: Fantasy Senate Simulator
description: Create a political party, win elections, respond to events, pass laws, govern, create your version of utopia and even go to war with your neighbors in this senate simulator with a fantasy twist.

name: Flappy Swan
description: Flappy Swan is a casual game where u control a swan to fly and dodge skyscrapers in an stunning synthwave style.100x Steam Achievments (just start the game)Have A Good Flight!

name: Deep Time
description: Shift dimensions and harness cosmic parkour abilities to solve mind-bending puzzles. Reverse the heat death of the universe in this surreal 3D platformer.

name: Dreaming Dead Dance
description: Survive as long as possible from an onslaught of hundreds hiding in the dark in this rogue-lite survival game. Augment your spells together to create waves of destruction through the horde in the dark.

name: Dungeon Bar: Gachi Puzzles
description: Dungeon Bar is a classic puzzle game in neonoir style. You will have to piece by piece collect pictures of legendary personalities of the Gachimuchi...

name: District XiLin
description: This is a first-person city exploration game similar to a walking simulator. It is an open-world game that takes place in a real Chinese city called XiLin.

name: Elfs From Elsewhere!
description: "Elfs from Elsewhere" invites you to embark on a brief yet captivating visual novel adventure, where mystery and adventure collide in a world teeming with elves and demons.

name: Chapter Wars
description: Immerse yourself in thrilling first-person shooter battles across three unique maps. Confront rival clans, adapt to hostile locals, and face off against relentless alien creatures. Join the eternal struggle for dominance and choose your side in this action-packed battle for supremacy!

name: Conspyration
description: ConSPYration is a spy-themed, LOCAL multiplayer game for up to 6 players. Your goal is to steal the briefcase and reach for the exit, but beware, eveyr stage is full of perils and the rival spies won't let you escape so easy!

name: Cozy Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Cozy Jigsaw Puzzle is not just a game; it's a serene journey that takes you to a world of beauty and peace. Experience the joy of solving puzzles in the coziest way possible. Get ready to lose yourself in the gentle challenge and embrace the art of relaxation.

name: CyVenge
description: CyVenge is a fast paced and action packed rougelite arena shooter. Choose from many upgradable weapons and abilities and help Cy fight against numerous waves of enemies!

name: Color Corruption
description: This first person shooter takes colors to the action while maintaining a mistery of what happened to all color islands. Can you unravel it's secrets?

name: Alone
description: Alone Is a First Person Time Based Survival Game. Lost in the woods of Orah, something is hunting you.

name: A-Girl
description: "A-GIRL" is a unique game that combines anime-style, top-down shooting, and multiple adorable beast girls. Come and explore the fascinating game world with these cute beast girls.

name: AFK Chess
description: A PvP chess auto battler! Strategically build your army, use tactics to position your pieces and then watch them fight against your opponents! Can you assemble the strongest force?

name: Aerofly RC 10: RC Flight Simulator
description: Aerofly RC 10 is the ultimate radio controller flight simulator for beginners and experts alike.

name: Anno 1800: Cosmetic Pack Bundle 2
description: Get the new Anno 1800 Cosmetic Pack Bundle and use the latest seven cosmetic DLCs to decorate your city as you wish!

name: Bockito
description: In Bockito you'll have to fight against a horde of hostile pine cones and other enemies. To do this, equip yourself with different items, learn abilities and combine them into different builds to survive.

name: Black Mountain Kings
description: You were thrown in a strange world. You are alone, and you got nothing. What to do next? You decide it! Explore, defeat monsters, get riches, learn new abilities, discover secrets, and learn the truth.

name: Birthday Boy and Benny
description: An emotional story-rich game with an emphasis on exploring the unknown, surviving abuse, dealing with inner demons and disabilities, making a ton of cakes, and dealing with the fact that not everything lasts forever.

name: Bemis Wamilton Racing
description: Drive with Bemis Wamilton race in this race game with electronic racing cars against other competitors

name: Betrayal Beach
description: Crashed on a strange island, survivors must forage, craft, and complete objectives to stay alive. But ferocious beasts, harsh weather, and secret saboteurs seek to make sure they never escape. Betray your friends or survive the island in Betrayal Beach, a 4-8 player social deduction survival game.

name: Catacombs
description: Roam around the catacombs, collect everything and avoid being found at all cost. It will see you. It will chase you.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler – Spain Reserve
description: Write your own fishing story in Aguas Claras. With gorgeous, vibrant nature and charming, picturesque fishing spots, it’s no wonder this Andalusian paradise is cherished by anglers around the world.

name: Matchy Matchy
description: Welcome to Matchy Matchy, the puzzle game of animal love. Connect pairs (or more) of matching animals to solve puzzles, get points, and make love not war.

name: Orul
description: Made for local game jam under 48h hours. Platformer about bending space and connecting it in your mind. Have fun.

name: Olden Peak
description: A short, challenging soulslike with metroidvania elements. Made in PICO 8 by Abhi Sundu. Olden Peak is a melee combat-focused metroidvania with some soulslike elements like limited healing flasks and stamina.

name: Swordfish
description: An aquatic action game. Swim sword first into the deep to destroy the evil at the heart of the ocean.

name: Pico Zombie Garden
description: A demake of the first world of the original Plants vs. Zombies. 10 levels, 8 different plants, 5 different zombies, 3 complete songs!

name: Zolo
description: Zolo is a Commodore 64 uridium shoot'em up game released in 1987 by ItalVideo/Ocean.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou 3D Neo
description: Sin descripción

name: Frost Bite
description: Use your grappling skills to climb each mountain. Watch out for snow beasts!

name: The Bourntyverse!
description:
Welcome to the Bourntyverse!

Explore the Bourntyverse, play games, and experience the joy of Bournty!

name: Shikakukes
description: Puzzle game for Playdate

name: Secret Kiss
description: Can you keep a secret?

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island 2: Original Revamp
description: You're Greg, you've been working on Treasure Island for a good few months, until, one day, your boss signs you up for another position, you're going to work in Treasure Island's main power building which supplies power for the Island's attractions and lights, you're a night guard in there for 5 nights due to recent reports of suspicious activity. Your job is to find out what's happening there. Nothing will go wrong right? On an island of Disney Dreams.

name: Frasier Fantasy
description: Frasier Fantasy is a loving tribute to the show "Frasier" in turn-based RPG form. Filled with Easter Eggs and callbacks, this is the game for anyone wondering if Eddie ever blinked first.

name: Tears to Tiara: Kakan no Daichi
description: All ages remake of the PC game Tears to Tiara with SRPG combat.

name: The Binding of Isaac: Fall from Grace
description:
Do you have what it takes to keep it cool in the Boiler?

Face off against brand new challenges in this alternate floor to the Downpour! Weave through seas of steam, and slay blistered freaks in this mod, which has been created by some of those who have worked on mods such as Fiend Folio and Revelations!

name: A-Train Evolution Pack
description: This edition includes the PlayStation version of AIV: Evolution Global, a PlayStation Mouse, an A-Train mousepad, and a PlayStation memory card.

name: AIV: A-Ressha de Ikou 4 - 15th Anniversary
description: As a celebration of their 15 year anniversary, Artdink re-released a few games as a 15th anniversary edition. This re-release of AIV was programmed to run on Windows 98 as well as previous versions, which hadn't been able to play this game prior.

name: AIV: A-Ressha de Ikou 4 - XP Taiou-ban
description: 2004 reissue of the fourth entry in the A-Train series from 1993, officially compatible with Windows versions up to Windows XP.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou: The 21st Century - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: A-Ressha de Ikou: The 21st Century - Perfect Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Rumba Lumber
description: Rumba Lumber is an Action game, developed and published by Taito Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1984.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou i
description: Released on the DoCoMo 504i/505i/506i/900 mobile phones as a service planning game and distributed by Hudson Soft. Players had to pay a monthly fee to access the game.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou EZ
description: Sin descripción

name: A-Train 9 Version 5.0: Final
description: Sin descripción

name: Cross-Stitch World
description: Enjoy doing Cross-Stitch patterns on your computer without threading a needle or risking a pricked finger with hundreds of beautiful patterns to play.

name: Cookie Run: The Darkest Night - Chapter 1
description:
You will play as a not-so-brave cookie named GingerBrave, must find the courage to battle his enemies and solve puzzles to grow into the courageous leader he was destined to be. Along the way, he meets a color cast of ally cookies to help him on this journey.

Step into the immersive world of CookieRun and experience life from a unique perspective – that of a small, freshly baked Cookie. Your journey starts with a daring escape from an oven, setting the stage for an epic adventure.

name: Anno 1800: Definitive Annoversary Edition
description: Improve your experience in Anno 1800 with the Definitive Annoversary Edition as part of the brand’s 25th Annoversary celebration!

name: Seen
description: Submission for Halloween game jam and created in only two weeks. You have been bitten by a vampire who puts you into a "saw-like" trial where you must prove worthy of the dark gift he has given you or be destroyed. This is a short game (10 minute maximum, your time is ticking) with two characters to select from, and two endings based on your choices.

name: Bionicle: Kanohi Klash
description: A fanmade 1-on-1 fighting game based on the Bionicle toyline from Lego.

name: Freddy in Space 3: Chica in Space
description:
Freddy in Space 3: Chica in Space is the 3rd title in the "Freddy in Space" series. The Game Jolt page is fully themed as a game for the upcoming "Five Nights at Freddy's" film but was just another troll by Scott Cawthon that pokes fun at the different parts of the fandom all the way from memes to Rule 34.

Based on the upcoming Five Nights at Freddy's movie, experience the movie's storyline as an interactive adventure. For those who don't want the movie spoiled for them, I would recommend staying away from this game until after next week! MAJOR SPOILERS AHEAD!

name: Marionetes
description:
Marionetes is a narrative-driven 3D platform adventure game about a discarded marionette.

Painful and sad performances of a brilliant marionette. Trown in the furnace by her creator the poor ballerina has to learn how to live without the strings.

name: Monkey Party
description: Merge balls, unleash adorable monkeys, and build a tower of fun in Monkey Party! Master precision placement for maximum monkey mischief. It's a charming puzzle adventure that's easy to play and hard to put down!

name: Monopoly
description: Monopoly is a GBA conversion of the classic board game of the same name. The game can be played with a computer player or another player. The game has 4 different modes to choose from including timed mode, custom mode, timed limit mode (playing the game with a time limit), and standard mode.

name: Fire on the Mountain
description: Fire on the Mountain is a 5 map limit-removing episode for Doom II and is my first proper mapset. Difficulty is slightly above Doom II, so this WAD should be fairly easy going.

name: ButtonHunt
description: Navigate your way through thirty creative levels in search of a red button.

name: Dragon Blaze
description:
Welcome to the epic world of Dragon Blaze, one of the best legends in the role-playing game genre! With its emphasis on raid battles, strategic combat, immersive story, and a shadow conspiracy that will keep you hooked, it is a must-play for fans of the RPG games.

In Dragon Blaze, you'll enter a shadow realm filled with deadly enemies, memorable characters, and exciting battles of skill and strategy. Through raid battles, you can obtain powerful items that can be used to enhance your abilities and strengthen your character, making them the ultimate RPG hero that's perfect for your playstyle.

With the special character classes and abilities, you'll have the freedom to create a unique character that reflects your style and strengths. Whether you're battling fierce bosses, exploring the world of DB, or growing your character to your heart's content, there's never a dull moment in this legends RPG game.

name: Dinobreak Triassic Torment Collection
description: Experience three unforgettable survival horror nightmares!

name: Prison in Cafe
description: Open your dream restaurant. Create a unique exterior and interior, hire the best workers and chefs, create a place where people will love to eat, spend time and spend their money. Simulation of the restaurant business.

name: Tank Cafe
description: Open your dream restaurant. Create a unique exterior and interior, hire the best workers and chefs, create a place where people will love to eat, spend time and spend their money. Simulation of the restaurant business.

name: Tricky Tanks
description:
Tricky tanks is a local couch multiplayer game.

Imagine a realtime Worms x Towerfall x Bomberman on steroids. Playable from 2 ro 4 players, with a variety of absurd weapons ( Cheese Bombs, Elephants, Bowling Balls, etc...) and 4 different environments.

name: Thief in Cafe
description: Open your dream restaurant. Create a unique exterior and interior, hire the best workers and chefs, create a place where people will love to eat, spend time and spend their money. Simulation of the restaurant business.

name: ButtonHunt 2
description:
30 more creative levels await you in the much improved sequel to ButtonHunt.

The highscores display in miliseconds. The lower the score you have the better!

name: Ghost Road
description: “Ghost Road” is the first installment in the Ghost Road series of games, and is a visual novel game about the myth of ghosts and monsters in the Chinese underworld. The player plays the role of the Ghost Detainer in the underworld to investigate the past deeds of the three female leaders.

name: New Leaf Traveler and Youth's Memories
description: New Leaf Traveler and Youth's Memories "is a short story RPG that involves playing the role of a young owner of a forest tavern and trying to run your own business to repay your debts. Meeting various guests and understanding their stories...

name: Tether
description: Grab your friends, and some rocks, in Tether: A unique multiplayer physics platformer about conquering rock-climbing challenges! Swap the old run-and-jump routine for a gripping new grab-and-swing adventure in this speedrunner-friendly game.

name: Young Hearts
description: ‘Young Hearts' is a visual novel in the genres of romance and slice of life, telling stories about the everyday life of a student company living in a warm southern town: stories about their secrets, dreams, love, their problems and ghosts of the past…

name: Xatrom Command
description: Team up and shoot down waves of invading aliens. Single player or multiplayer top-down shooting action

name: War Maze
description: War Maze is a turn based strategy game based on chess! Position yourself and take down the enemy pieces to win!

name: Yeah! Wow! Hey!
description: High difficulty multiplayer 3D platform jumping game. The high requirement for view control plus less tolerance creates more challenging levels.

name: The Raindrop: A Vocal Odyssey
description: Become Poseidon's voice and harness the elemental power of ice, water, and vapor in this enchanting 2D platformer, drawing inspiration from the rich tapestry of Greek mythology. Your voice becomes the key to unlocking intricate puzzles in a visually striking world.

name: Tugboat Terror
description: A frantic and exciting task-management adventure game where you play as Alessandro, a fish with human legs, and pilot a tugboat through a dangerous swamp of radioactive monsters.

name: Ultimate Scroll
description: This is a casual card game set in the backdrop of cultivation-themed Xianxia world. In this game, players control cultivators who challenge demon caves, search for treasures in the treasure pavilion, and overcome tribulations in the heavenly tower to enhance their cultivation levels.

name: Uncle Nook's Survivors
description: Uncle Nook's Survivors is an action rogue-like game. Survive an onslaught of monsters and become the ultimate monster killing machine by upgrading your character with unique weapons and abilities.

name: Sunken Stones
description: A turn based Puzzle-Strategy game about pirates and cursed treasure. Choose a captain, gather your crew and defeat monsters by strategically placing units on a 5x5 grid.

name: Stunt Xpress
description: Become a delivery van driver. The best in the world. Take part in internationally renowned delivery van driving championships. Shoot your parcels (on time) into customer's homes like a marksman while performing gravity-defying stunts and being chased by god knows what.

name: Strange Adventures
description: This is an action adventure game where players need to manipulate the protagonist to traverse the steep canyon, constantly improving their operational skills while exploring unknown terrain and fighting against enemies.

name: Snail Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted to be a snail? Now you can be! Move around (very slowly)! Look at the beautiful (low poly) scenery! MMOS (Massive Multiplayer Online Snails)! BECOME a snail (in a simulation)!

name: Skolly's Adventure
description: Explore a sky filled with floating islands as Skolly, an unusual adventurer in search of all the hidden treasures of this forgotten world.

name: Silkbulb Test
description: Take the test!

name: Spooky Dwellers: Collector's Edition
description: Unleash the power of the talismans of light, cast out lurking spirits, and transform Grandma's haunted house into the ultimate Halloween party destination!

name: Shattered Lands
description: Simplified real time strategy game where you lead an island expedition. The player can take direct control of a hero on the battlefield and fight enemies head on! Choose between various heroes with unique abilities and playstyles. Conquer the mysterious islands for the kingdom!

name: Seed of the Dead: Charm Song
description: Seed of the Dead: Sweet Home expansion has arrived! This time the theme is "Idol"(?) Five new stories and stages have been added, bringing the excitement level to a new high.

name: Prostitute Island
description: Build the best love hotel in the world and have tons of sex every day!

name: Quinn & Flynn
description: A mature queer visual novel, telling the heated and convoluted story of the love triangle between Quinn, an obsessive police detective, Elias, Quinn's direct superior, and Flynn, a poet with a very talented tongue, caught in a criminal case that spirals rapidly out of hand.

name: Resurrect
description: Journey a haunted map, strategizing card duels. Balance life and hunger, aided by an evolving monster ally. Face the final boss; master the abyss or be devoured.

name: Romanticized Dreams of a Post-Apocalyptic Cowpoke
description: Romanticized Dreams of a Post-Apocalyptic Cowpoke is a top down action shooter with randomly generated loot, levels, and enemies. Find unique weapons and upgrades to blast, explode, laser, and kick your way through an army of dastardly bandits!

name: Mineblast
description: Destroy whole levels using TNTs and have fun with the physics of Mineblast.

name: Mother's Embrace
description: 'Mother's Embrace' - indie horror game set in a remote Latvian town, where the unforgiving winter serves as the backdrop to a harrowing story. You return here only to find your childhood home eerily deserted, its once welcoming streets now shrouded in a deafening silence.

name: Project Terra
description: In a strange and hostile world, Raka, an exploration robot, finds themselves alone and separated from their friends. Help them reunite with their companions and unravel the mysteries hidden within this new world.

name: Princess Chessboard
description: “Princess Chessboard” is a turn-based casual light strategy card-building game based on dice. As a warrior in the animal kingdom, please go and find the runaway princess.

name: Only Up 2
description: Reach new heights in "Only Up 2," set in a mysterious world above the clouds, brimming with secrets waiting to be unearthed. Embark on an ascent like no other, the only limit is the sky.

name: Orc Survivor
description: Orc Survivor catapults you into a harrowing world where the roar of the crowd is deafening, your adrenaline is pumping, and every step taken could be your last. Survive as an orc warrior imprisoned and thrust into the merciless Colosseum. Will you conquer or become just another forgotten casualty?

name: Pico Topia
description: A tiny citybuilder where you combine islands to gather resources, complete missions, unlock new buildings and increase your build area.

name: Once Upon a Time There was a Twin-Tailed Sister Princess Who Was Very Unfriendly.
description: Sin descripción

name: Odyssey Island
description: Odyssey Island is a punchy party-based action RPG. Fight dangerous beasts, go fishing, argue about the meaning of family, commit crimes or simply chill on deck with your new-found crew.

name: Nerd Survivors
description: Use explosive pizzas, enchanted fidget spinners or a katamari of monsters to fight countless enemies hordes! Repair the "Forge of Destiny" and craft the ultimate custom weapon in this comedy action rogue-lite survivor.

name: Aerofly RC 10: Expansion Pack 2
description: The Aerofly RC 10 Expansion Pack 2 includes 100 new models and 20 new sceneries. Improve your flying skills or just have fun with the various new models in highly detailed sceneries.

name: Aerofly RC 10: Expansion Pack 1
description: The Aerofly RC 10 Expansion Pack 1 includes 100 new models and 20 new sceneries. Improve your flying skills or just have fun with the various new models in highly detailed sceneries.

name: Invector: Rhythm Galaxy - Spinnin' Song Pack
description: Unleash the energy of the Spinnin' Song Pack, featuring 6 thrilling songs by the likes of Martin Solveig & GTA, Sam Feldt ft. RANI, R3HAB & INNA & Sash!, ÖWNBOSS & Sevek, Tujamo, Bingo Players ft. Far East Movement.

name: Pumpkin Game
description: "Pumpkin Game" is a falling object puzzle game in which players try to pile up as many vegetables as possible so that they do not overflow from the basket. When two or more vegetables collide with each other, they combine and evolve into a larger vegetable.

name: Know
description: "Know" is a cute, eerie, and slightly melancholic adventure game. Explore, evade "Kaiubutsu" (monsters), and uncover the secrets of this world!

name: Mayhem Mail
description: The mail has been scattered! Take on the mail route from hell, recover and deliver the mail to its rightful place! Mayhem Mail is a classic single screen arcade platformer in the vein of Donkey Kong, Bubble Bobble and Mario Bros. with some added puzzle elements.

name: Marshmallows On Halloween
description: It's Halloween night.

name: Mareld
description: Mareld is a card-driven Roguelike role-playing game where you play as a traveler lost in the Lost Forest. You will recruit companions, collect resources, craft items, explore the world, defeat enemies, find your way back home, or uncover the secrets of this extraordinary world.

name: Mansion At Midnight
description: You are trapped in a haunted mansion with only your wits and your friends beside you. Search the mansion for a means to defend yourself from the horrors that wander through its halls. Be warned, this mansion seems alive, and some of these items carry a terrible curse.

name: Marron's Day
description: Marron's Day is a silly adventure game where you're a bunny! You love your friends but love carrots even more. Explore the town, run errands for your animal friends, and don't let anyone catch you swiping the carrots from the garden (again)!

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Bewitched Garden Set - Halloween 2022
description: Host a spellbinding pizza soiree with this set!

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Mysterious Antiques Set - Halloween 2022
description: Make your pizzeria frighteningly fantastic!

name: Legend Of Peks: Halloween Horror
description: Welcome to the Haloween Horror DLC Pack!

name: Irritated Mind: Fear of Warehouse
description: After a tragic incident, your relocation to a new city leads you to a warehouse job with chilling twists. Survive 7 grueling work shifts, evade relentless enemy threats, and uncover the mysteries shrouding your character's past, where an intricate narrative unravels amidst retro-inspired graphics.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Nature
description: Jigsaw Puzzle: Nature offers 30 unique levels in a relaxing atmosphere. Go on a colorful adventure through the seasons and complete beautiful jigsaws!

name: Kana Ka-Boom
description: Kana Ka-Boom is for those interested in starting their journey of learning the Japanese language, and for those looking for a fun way to practice and retain their Katakana and Hiragana skills.

name: Katsl
description: Welcome to Katsl, the island town for cats! Unleash your inner architect and craft cozy nooks for your adorable kittizens. Dive into their world, discover their dreams and quirks, and weave them into your feline tale. Time to unwind and let your paw-some adventure begin!

name: Last Day Lockdown
description: Bid farewell to the mundane and embrace the extraordinary as you step into "Last Day Lockdown," a thrilling office escape puzzle that transforms your farewell into an unforgettable journey!

name: Grim Potions
description: Immerse yourself in the magical world of "Grim Potions," where, as an alchemist, you use special dice to create mystical elixirs. Manage an apothecary shop, serving diverse heroes, and aspire to become a legendary alchemist.

name: Hell Games
description: Get ready for Hell Games: In this 4 player action arena brawler fallen Olympians, once cheaters and dopers, battle it out in the depths of hell. Knock out opponents with sports gear, power up, and strive to be the last one standing.

name: Heroes de Peronia
description: Save the kingdom by fighting the rats and their cronies, restore the health of the people.

name: Hyperrail Detective
description: Find clues, build a team, and battle your way through the train to unravel the mysteries of the Hyperrail.

name: Impossible Bunny Challenge
description: Surf the wind as a Bunny and race against three other Bunnies to collect checkpoint balls. The game features a robust racing AI that is very challenging to beat. You’ll have to learn quickly if you want to beat the Impossible Bunny Challenge!

name: Freestyle Studio
description: Rap battle others, practice your freestyling skills, advance in the rapping community. Freestyle Studio is a fun way to practice your rapping skills, whether that be alone or against others.

name: Fresh Story
description: Fresh Story is a visual novel about one girl's difficult journey. She will face difficulties and hard decisions to achieve a peaceful life as she dreamed.Diana came from the suburbs to the big city to achieve success and a happy life with her boyfriend Vlad.

name: Gaula Survival
description: A third-person survival game, explore territories and settle in. Surviving this hostile world is the name of the game.

name: Goblin's Die
description: Goblin’s Die is an Action-Adventure co-op game for 1-4 players with a comical twist. Jump in the boots of a common goblin to gather resources, craft equipment and strengthen your hive to help you battle enemies and explore the world.

name: Dino Tower Arena
description: Lets beat'em all! In this dinosaur combat roguelike, you will build and upgrade your own dinosaur with lots of special abilities and fight over enemy dinosaurs while going up the floors of a enormous tower

name: Fifth World
description: This is a very interesting puzzle game.

name: Fish Flop
description: Fish Flop is a fun, physics-based adventure where one fish must escape a fish market, and get back home to the sea!

name: FoMO
description: FoMo is a psychological and first person horror game where inexplicable events throw your boring life off track. Walk between your destroyed neighborhood and bloody workplace, go through labyrinths, be stealthy and avoid the monsters. Struggle to survive as you look for a way out.

name: Eerie Desolation
description: A phycological open world paranormal investigation game. You and up to 3 friends can traverse the cursed and lost town of Willows Creek as you tread to free the paranormal that are stuck between planes of existence. Free the souls so you can free yourself from Solmeloks evil curse.

name: Data Garden
description: A text-less comic-game hybrid about data, interaction and digital identity playable with only one button.

name: Crystal Comet
description: Team up with your squad & take on the galaxy in this frantic twin stick space shooter "Squad em' up". Play single player with the AI or drop in / drop out local co-op!

name: Cozy Island Idle
description: Cozy Island Idle is a cute and relaxing idle game where you catch all sort of fantasy fishes to showcase them in an Aquarium. You can sell them to turn a profit and customize your island.

name: Cutie Crowd Control
description: A funny physics puzzle game where you play as a sheepdog desperately trying to save your sheep from silly traps that knock them out in funny and surprisingly complicated ways. Meet cute animals, save them from themselves, or don't and just cause mayhem.

name: 100 Pumpkins 2
description: Explore, solve puzzles, and fight your way through over 100 screens and return your pumpkin pals!

name: Alaca
description: Alaca is an action rogue like game with a Top down perspective. While it contains different types of weapons and elements, you must build and master your character by combining them in the most correct way. There is no save point. kill, build character, learn and repeat..

name: Broadsword: Warlord Edition
description: Broadsword: Warlord Edition is a turn-based tactical strategy game set to historical events of medieval conflict. Assemble your armies and put your tactics to the test, in Broadsword: Warlord Edition.

name: Burning Sword: Death Sun
description: Burning Sword: Death Sun is a Wuxia hack n' slash game. Play as the great fighter, Zhāng Yì Xiàn, who seeks revenge for the death of his family at the hands of China's powerful Gāo Tiān Qí. Dive into a tale of revenge, redemption, martial arts, and intense swordplay.

name: Cosmic Cursor
description: Cosmic Cursor is an arcade roguelike that combines kinetic melee-based combat with a dynamic bullet hell. Use the cursor to control a vast array of ships and survive increasingly complex enemy swarms as you battle through the cosmos.

name: Brave and Desire
description: Brave and Desire is a party battle roguelite RPG with a structure and events that change every time you start! Advance through the dungeon using a route selection system and aim to step through the innermost part of the dungeon!

name: Block The Monster
description: The way I make it becomes the way! A round at the square block! Square Block 3D Tower Defense with various routes and strategies! Turn the tide of battle by deploying powerful heroes. How many waves can you hold on until the defense collapses and breaks down?

name: Blacksite Theta
description: A 3D puzzle platformer developed as a project for the 2023 UW-Whitewater Capstone Course. Harness your newfound mutant arm powers to conquer challenging terrain, ultimately unlocking your path to freedom by solving puzzles and navigating treacherous obstacles to escape the facility.

name: Bargain Puzzle Grid
description: A Casual But Challenging Puzzle Grid. Roll and Rotate Column's and Rows of Cube's to Make islands of like cube's. You try to get the highest board score you can. it has a familiar feel of classic puzzles

name: ButtonHunt 3
description: Work your way through thirty creative puzzles as quickly and efficiently as possible in the conclusion to the award-winning ButtonHunt series. Your buttons are waiting.

name: Archery Showdown
description: Archery Showdown is a local PvP platformer where you can challange with your friends in an archery-balistic 2D fighting!

name: Arcanora
description: Step into the mystical realm of Arcanora, a rogue-lite magical adventure! where darkness shrouds a labyrinthine world. Battle hordes of ferocious spiders using an arsenal of diverse staffs. How many waves can you endure before the unyielding arachnid surge overwhelms you?

name: Arcane Fighters
description: Arcane Fighters is 2D platform PvP where you can fight against your friends using magic, strategy and ... MAGIC! Choose from many unique spells and set up your build to outsmart opponents. Still early access so stay tuned!

name: Aquatia
description: Dive into Aquatia, a third-person anime-action RPG game, where you'll become the master of water magic. Experience the graceful aqua ballet, using water magic to defeat monsters with finesse.

name: Little Problems
description: Little Problems is a Cozy Detective game about solving mysteries around minor inconveniences, everyday misunderstandings, and of course, little problems. This game is not about saving the world; it's about enriching it, one case at a time.

name: Clear Vision Elite
description: Clear Vision Elite is a free stick-sniper game. This time with a kitchen, a computer, an office, and much more. The physics, the puzzles, the stick men, the aiming. It all comes together with your choice of guns and ammo to create a truly immersive sniper experience. Is it revenge, are you trying to save the world? Are you doing it just for the money?

name: Lost Identities
description: In this mystery-themed adventure game FBI agents Alice Holloway and Derek Chase are sent undercover to the little town of Heart’s Gate. Heart’s Gate became a model neighborhood but problems began to surface. Social workers have seen teen runaways develop a 180-degree shift in their personalities after they returned home.

name: Zero Target
description:
Zero Target, known in Japan as Shooting Down King, is a shooter video game developed by Data East and released in 1985 for arcades.
In Zero Target the player controls a fighter plane, with the action seen from a first person view inside of the fighter's cockpit. The player can move the view in any direction, with a targeting reticule in the middle of the screen used to aim at enemy fighters.

name: Nickelodeon Kart Racers Collection
description:
Nickelodeon Kart Racers Collection is a Nickelodeon crossover video game box set released for the Nintendo Switch

3 Games include
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers 2: Grand Prix
- Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway

name: Minecraft: Star Wars - Path of the Jedi
description: For Minecraft players who want to experience the thrill of being a Jedi Knight, Minecraft Star Wars: Path of the Jedi offers an immersive experience that lets you train as a padawan, battle monsters, duel other Jedi, and master the force. Support the Jedi council during the clone wars and join on a special mission with Yoda to uncover the mysteries of an uncharted planet. The experience is complete with your droid companion by your side and lightsaber at the ready.

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Cubed
description:
Plants vs. Zombies: Cubed is a Quilt-only mod made to bring Plants vs. Zombies content to Minecraft. The objective is to add as many plants, zombies, and references from the PvZ franchise as possible.

Build defenses with your favorite plants, try to survive for as long as possible against the ever-increasing zombie waves in survival mode, stage fights between plants and zombies in creative mode, hypnotize Gargantuars and ride on them, and more...

name: Sky War
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft Education: Planet Earth III
description: BBC Studios and Minecraft Education are teaming up once again to reimagine Earth’s most intriguing corners (and creatures!) into an explorable, blocky format!

name: Project Michael: The Halloween Nightmare
description: Project Michael: The Halloween Nightmare is a Horror Adventure game which invites the players into an atmospheric adventure nightmare.

name: The Return to Freddy's Classic
description: As Mike Schmidt was about to quit his job, he found the news article about the pizzeria saying: The "Ever So Popular" Pizzeria's Animatronics have been fixed and repaired at last! They have also fixed and brought back everyone's favorite pirate fox, Foxy. The murderer of the four children and one missing child has yet to be found. They also brought back something from the old pizzeria. Something to bring back to the hopes and joys of children and grown ups alike! But the building has yet to be cleaned... Not responsible for injury/dismemberment.

name: Super Huggie Bros
description: Enter in the Super Huggie Bros world facing the mysterious islands, jump and run over the obstacles, and fight against super evil monsters to find his treasure at the final destination in a dangerous world. Complete all levels, collect coins and destroy every block to find the keys and open the gates.

name: Dink Smallwood HD
description:
Dink Smallwood is a humorous role-playing video game. It was first released in 1998 before becoming freeware on October 17, 1999. It was developed by Robinson Technologies, at the time consisting of Seth Robinson, Justin Martin, and Greg Smith. Mitch Brink composed several of the game's music tracks, while others are MIDI forms of classical music such as Debussy's Reverie. The game has a small but dedicated fan following that continues to develop add-ons for the game more than a decade after its release.

The HD version features remastered soundtrack, new quality of life features, built-in mod support, an upgraded engine, and gamepad support.

name: Starting Blocks
description: Starting Blocks is a Sports game, developed and published by Coktel Vision, which was released in Europe in 1988

name: Super Mario 74: The Twelve Year Comet
description: Sin descripción

name: Abandoned: Discovery Island
description: Abandoned: Discovery Island (Five Nights at Treasure Island: Found before V0.8.0) is a fanmade revival of Five Nights at Treasure Island, a fangame based off of Five Nights at Freddy's by Scott Cawthon and Abandoned By Disney by Christopher Howard Wolf.

name: Honoo no Toukyuuji: Dodge Danpei
description:
Honoo no Toukyuuji: Dodge Danpei is a Japanese manga series based on dodgeball, by Tetsuhiro Koshita, which was serialized in CoroCoro Comic. It was adapted into an anime from 1991 to 1992, and eight video game adaptations.

A sequel, titled Honō no Tōkyūjo: Dodge Danko, began serialization on the Weekly CoroCoro Comic website on November 28, 2022. It has been nominated for the Next Manga Award in the web manga category in 2023.

name: Hack 0
description: Sin descripción

name: Wolverine: Feral Instinct
description: Uncover the mystery unfolding at the Weapon X facility and show your enemies exactly why you’re the best at what you do.

name: Clash of Evil: The Comeback
description: Battle in an all-out clash of scary characters. Visit different stages and maps to experience each character's world. More characters and maps in further updates.

name: The Lords of Midnight
description: Mike Singleton's '84 classic Adventure Strategy game, brought to and updated for modern platforms.

name: Mario Gives Up
description: Mario has had it with saving Peach! After sentencing her to her death, Mario heads off on a cool adventure!

name: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Room Zero
description: Five Nights at Treasure Island: Room Zero is the upcoming Five Nights at Treasure Island and Five Nights at Freddy's fan-game

name: Terrorween Playdate Bundle
description:
Bubble, Bubble, Toil, and Trouble: cranks undocked & prepare for a struggle.

Wicked souls unite! There's a spook in the air this October. Welcome to the Terrorween Bundle. Be delighted with 8 eerie-sistible games with a touch of the Halloween spirit!

Don't let this spooktacular bundle slip away. Missing it would be a monster of a mistake.

name: Minecraft: Tricky Trials
description: Tricky Trials is an update for Minecraft: Java Edition filled with daring adventures and surprising rewards. Hunt for the trial chambers, and take on the challenge that awaits you in this sprawling copper structure. Fight off unfamiliar foes like the bogged and the breeze in your hunt for an elusive trial key! Then unlock your reward from the vault, a block that makes adventuring fun for every player, no matter the size of your party.

name: Amnea 28: Dve Vechnosti
description:
Amnea 28 is a story about a group of young people who go to listen to a course of lectures by a respected professor of psychology. The purpose of the trip is the old hotel "Amnea", which ceased to fulfill its main functions ten years ago, and now serves as a secluded corner for the professor. During the week of studying, each new day the atmosphere is inexorably changing.

Why did the students suddenly start acting strangely? What are they hiding? The main character will have to figure out the secrets of "Amnea", otherwise the walls of the old hotel will not let her leave alive.

name: Tree of Ashes
description: Tree of Ashes is a 2D bullet heaven game set in a dark post-apocalyptic fantasy world. You play as an emissary of an ancient AI tree that sends you out onto the banished land in hopes of fighting off the evil, returning the world to its peaceful state.

name: Sylvio: Black Waters
description: Stranded on an alien planet. Witness the past to discover the truth in a game of enthralling atmospheric exploration horror.

name: Bottle Can Float
description: Bottle Can Float is a relaxing casual game. In the game, you will select a bottle to go down the river. It will float freely along the flowing water. You can do You can influence the direction of the bottle by throwing small stones, and there are different small animals hidden in the river. You can make rafting more interesting by looking for these contents. I hope you can relax and have fun in the sound of gurgling water.

name: A-Ressha de Ikou
description: Port of A-Ressha de Ikou for the Family Computer.

name: Vampire Survivors: Whiteout
description: The 1.7.0 patch for Vampire Survivors brings a new snow-inspired special stage, Whiteout, 2 new weapons, 1 new character and 2 new relics, with new achievements about the new content.

name: Super Rare Mixtape: Horror Edition
description: After lying dormant for a while, the Super Rare Mixtape is back! The curator of the Mixtape, Ryan Brown, has once again carefully collated a collection of 30 games and 8 game demos from small developers in the grassroots indie game scene onto a single USB drive, playable on your Windows PC. And this time, they’re all horror-themed!

name: Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip x Cult of the Lamb
