description: Embark on a road trip like no other in this co-op narrative survival adventure. Visit fun locations, meet wacky characters, and manage your resources wisely. And yes: you still can date some hot monsters.

name: Repose
description: Repose is an upcoming dark exploration/puzzle game. In Repose, explore, fight, and maintain a healthy sleep schedule as you descend the twisted levels of the corporation that hired you for unknown reasons.

name: Staring Time
description: A psychological horror game.

name: Antireal
description: Sin descripción

name: My Friendly Neighborhood: Neighborhorde
description: Something scary is happening with everyone's favorite Saturday morning puppet show... Fend off puppets and solve puzzles in this survival horror adventure.

name: Dread Delusion: Rise of the Skeletons
description: A new update has been brewed for this especially wicked season. A new isle has appeared! Are you ready to explore and uncover its secrets? We've also added a bevy of combat tweaks, sound, and other general adjustments.

name: Bite Size Terrors: Eye Candy
description: The Other Side of the Screen Shows a Truly Disturbing Truth.

name: Funeral Toll
description: A bloody war has caused the dungeons to explode with an incursion of prisoners, but this has lead to an excess of torture and violence. Now the dungeons are abandoned, and those who are left behind in the darkness are waiting for adventurers to meet their nightmares.

name: Creepshow
description: Creepshow is a video game based off the horror comedy anthology series that began in 1982.

name: Hello Cruel World
description: You are an urban explorer and you've just hit the motherload. Hidden under the carcass of an abandoned restaurant, a decrepit laboratory teems with secrets around every corner. Solve puzzles, avoid danger, and uncover the mystery the voice in your earpiece who haunts you.

name: Amanda the Adventurer 2
description: In Amanda the Adventurer 2, the story continues as Riley encounters a mysterious masked figure after destroying the TV in the attic. Travel to the Kensdale Public Library and dig deeper into the mystery of Amanda the Adventurer.

name: Alfred Chicken
description: Sin descripción

name: V-Pong
description: V-Pong, as the name implies, is pretty much a vertically played, one player game of Pong (or Breakout in screen orientation, but minus destroying any blocks).

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Garden Rush
description: Garden Rush is a PVZ2 mod that defines itself on being interesting, unique and a change of pace from your traditional Plants vs. Zombies 2 mod. We have Abilities, Hero Plants and all sorts of other minor changes you won't see in another mods.

name: 20th Century Frog
description: In 20th Century Frog, you play as a frog hopping around the screen to eat bugs and avoid deadly obstacles. Every alphanumeric key of the keyboard is used to control the movement of the frog, where the key's position relative to the space bar determines the direction and distance of the jump. Each hop consumes points, and each bug you eat replenishes them. If your points dip too far into the negative, the frog will perish. Eating ladybugs grants a "gimmick", a power up that can be used to counter a particular obstacle.

name: International Athletics
description: Sin descripción

name: Get the Glass
description:
Online board game made as a Got Milk? campaign,
Your mission is to help the milk-deprived Adachi family navigate and survive all five regions of the board, break into Fort Fridge and get the glass. Be careful! Fort Fridge security is hot on your tail. To begin the game, roll the dice. The Adachi van will drive to the corresponding squares.

name: Korekiyo's Epic Quest for Pussy
description: Korekiyo Shinguji, everyone’s favorite problematic anthropologist, wakes up one day with an almost irresistible thirst for pussy. Uh-oh! What will he do? What kind of wacky adventures will he have? What kinds of friends and foes will he meet on his journey? Find out in this silly and funny new RPG, Korekiyo’s Epic Quest for Pussy!

name: Tommy Is My Hero!
description:
Nelly lost all the balls she played with. Tommy proposed to help her.
He will need to explore the room-mazed environment to find all the balls. Each room will prepare dangers for him, and Tommy will have to avoid them by running and jumping.

name: Ball Jumper
description: Do you like colors and jumping? This is the right game for you. Jump from one colored blob to another colored blob and get the highest score.

name: Arcade Archives: Blandia
description: Set out on a war between the king and the world's mightiest warriors.

name: Cavern
description: Edit the Level as you play in Cavern, a Roguelike Puzzler. Select an object to open up the - SWAP MENU - and swap it out for another type. Turn a slime into a key. Or a rock into a bomb to clear your path. Even intercept bullets in mid air and send them back against enemies.

name: Big Blue
description:
"Take control of a treasure hunting diver in this exciting game of deep sea exploration. Select your dive location, explore to discover many species of fish, and maybe even find the key to a treasure chest for big rewards. But keep an eye on your air supply and watch out for the shark!

"Can you explore all the island locations, recover the treasure and discover all the species lurking down below?"

name: AstroRunner
description: AstroRunner - 3D runner game, in which you control a self-driving robot to safely collect scattered solar panels from a remote location. Collect as many parts as possible and increase the mileage of your pedometer.

name: Blyx
description: Blyx is a story-driven action-adventure game, where you can discover new worlds and fight with complex bosses. Solve interesting puzzles, jump between platforms, and battle enemies – all to help Blyx find his purpose among the realms.

name: Cat Fred Evil Pet
description: Care for a cute cat Fred. If the pet is displeased, a horror game will start!

name: Cats Hidden in China
description: Find 100 cats hiding in China in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game

name: Coopbots
description: 2 cute robots on a treasure hunt in a mysterious sci-fi pyramid. Coopbots is a fun 2-player online co-op puzzle game. Players solve puzzles together and overcome platform elements to solve the mysteries of the pyramid and find a treasure or two.

name: Ctrl-U
description: Ctrl-U is a science fiction parkour adventure with FPS elements, set in a huge industrial plant. You are Kyle (KY-13 Auxiliary Unit), a highly advanced android whose agility allows him to quickly reach any area of the factory to solve a variety of unforeseen problems.

name: Culture Warz: Time's Up Karen!
description: In a world not too dissimilar from ours, social media has rotted minds of the masses turning them into zombies driven by a primal urge to be the most insufferable versions of themselves whilst feasting on brains of the rest of humanity. Who will defeat these social stereotypes? It can only be Chad.

name: Crush Link TD
description: Protect your inbox from spam to find a message from your crush. A Tower Defense game with new mechanics in virtual setting about online dating.

name: Alligori
description: The land of Alligori needs a new king, and you've been requested to take over your grandfathers kingdom! Build your kingdom up from a village, to a town, city, and finally a kingdom. Delve into dungeons with puzzle-themed weapons, face epic bosses, and craft rings and amulets to help along the way!

name: Airport CEO: Helicopters
description: Lift your airport to a new standard with helicopters!

name: 14 Minesweeper Variants 2
description: Minesweeper but the rules are changing, again.

name: Tsukumogamis!
description: The not-at-all heartwarming school gag game ”Tsukumogamis!". Sumika, a girl possessed by a half-human Musubi, born of a Tsukumogami god father and a mother of kotodama, is a reclusive and scruffy JK! Will Musubi be able to collect many "good words" and become a man of his own?

name: Coin Toss Rainbow Simulator
description: Coin Toss Rainbow Simulator. Made in Hong Kong. Toss the coin and test your luck. By Unreal Engine 5.3.1.

name: Kingdom Idle Heart
description: This is a medieval style, management+development hang up game.

name: Y. Village: The Visitors
description: Batu, tormented by nightmares, is lured to a nameless village via cryptic letters. Investigating the village's secrets with just one friend, he wakes one night to discover his ally gone. He must now locate his friend and elude the village's dark mysteries.

name: Villa Escape
description: Escape room game set in a medieval village in Castile and its old mysteries that remain hidden to this day. A puzzle game to test your intellect and intuition.

name: Up Square
description: Up Square: A minimalistic, physics based, precision platformer, with unique biomes. Climb to the top of the leaderboard, complete difficult challenges for achievements and challenge your friends in various game modes!

name: Trouble Magnet
description: Accompany Charlie, who is transported to different times in the universe, in surviving the challenging nature of the ocean and returning to his own time.

name: Yahtzee Girl
description: Let's strip her down with Yahtzee game! Test your skills and dice luck Maybe I'll get a chance to touch her?

name: Way of the Hunter: Steyr Arms Pack
description: The Steyr Arms pack includes 4 new hunting rifles: Steyr SSG-M1, intended for mid-size big game. Steyr Mannlicher CL II Fullstock. Steyr Monobloc ARMAD, made from high-grade ARMAD steel. Steyr-Gams, the ideal rifle for high alpine hunting, based on the proven Ultra-Light rifle.

name: VoxelScaper
description: Build your perfect diorama.

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Dungeons of Edirne
description: While being in the Ottoman capital of Edirne, Vlad Voievod Dracula descends into the dungeons to save a great warrior sentenced to death, so he might join Dracula to take the crown of Wallachia. A casual relaxing game, in the Vlad Voievod Dracula franchise, that takes place before Episode 1.

name: Wizardry: High School Exam
description: Pass your magic exam with flying colors by surviving a final test within our dungeons. No worries, even though there may be numerous, highly resilient, and quite deadly exam golems, there is still time for you to excel, enhance your abilities, and learn a few new spells along the way.

name: West of the Witchlands
description: West of the Witchlands is a twin-stick shooter / roguelike about killing ancient gods with magic and revolvers.

name: Wishbound Desires
description: Embark on a visually stunning 2D roguelike deck-building adventure set in a Japanese-inspired fantasy world. Strategically craft your card deck during battle, enhancing and personalizing the cards with powerful rewards, and embark on an enchanting journey filled with mysteries and romance.

name: Unusual Quest
description: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You have to go through many levels, completing certain tasks and destroy enemies in the location.

name: Pokemon Saiph 2
description: Pokemon FireRed Rom Hack made by Vytron, sequel to Pokemon Saiph.

name: Red Line
description: Moving into a shabby apartment, a saturnine girl with hidden secrets finds a notebook that allows her to communicate with another world. A thrilling adventure taking place across multiple timelines ensues.

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: Requiem
description: Sin descripción

name: Xenos: Cartoon Creature Catcher
description: A retro creature collector/pet battler with a focus on hunting rare variants and making every Xeno unique. All Xenos have random stats and move-sets that vary even within the same species! Delve into a light-hearted world full of parody and fourth wall breaks while learning the world of Xenos!

name: Zorro and Zedd
description: Zorro and Zedd must use their magical powers to hunt down the 12 Dragon Lords of Dundalk, taking their sacred amulets and using them to access Dundalk's secret dimension. There they must defeat Octobatron the Dragon King and put an end to his 10,000 year reign of Terror!

name: The Dungeon
description: In the dungeon, a legendary endless treasure awaits. Countless brave adventurers have come, but none have unveiled its secrets. Monsters and traps fill the dungeon. Are you courageous enough to conquer them and claim the final treasure?

name: The Unknown
description: A psychological horror, first person platformer. Solve puzzles and dodge deadly obstacles while being haunted by mikes inner demons.

name: The Knowledge of Hermit
description: Non-Linear Top-down action-adventure-puzzle game with Power Ups & Health Upgrades.

name: The Witch and the Bottle of Concept
description: The meat pigeon game of Demon City, with meta elements, allows you to experience the joy of breaking the fourth wall, a refreshing sense of strike, and difficult battles. Do you want to challenge the thrill of harmless clearance?

name: Transporter
description:
Transporter is the next step in the classic transport sim genre. Solo-developed, modern transport game with classic, old-school grid environment, and newest features and options.
Create new transport routes on rail, road and water. Stock industries with raw materials. Drive the production and economy. Deliver materials and cargo to consumers. Supply power plants to generate electricity. Watch cities grow, deliver their passengers across large maps, and build your own transport company.
Combining realistic simulation with indie style to create a game that is easy to pick up and get into, but with enough depth and variety to remain interesting and satisfying for experienced transport sim players.

name: This Side Up
description: Simultaneously control four players who fall in different directions in this mind-bending puzzle platformer. Together they stand, divided they fall!

name: Towercore: Survivors
description: The dark creatures are coming, and you are the only obstacle to stop them. Survive night by night in those monster-infested lands! Towercore: Survivors is a challenging dark fantasy survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements.

name: Tracks n' Turrets
description: Get ready to embark on an exciting strategy adventure in a fantasy world where mobility and strategic planning are essential for survival. Prepare to defend your kingdoms on the move in "Tracks 'n' Turrets"!

name: TrainTastic
description: TrainTastic is a shared screen fighting game where you battle up to three friends playing many different types of trains! See who can dominate the arenas in a variety of themes to find out who truly is, TrainTastic!

name: Kanzen Chuukei Pro Yakyuu Greatest Nine
description: Greatest Nine began on the Sega Saturn in 1995. New releases in the series stopped for a while after 1998. However, it was revived in 2002 on the Game Boy Advance (GBA). This Game Boy Advance version has developed by Smilebit (absorbed by Sega in 2004), behind the Motto Pro Yakyuu Team o Tsukurou! franchise.

name: Two Hour Escape Mystery: A Puzzling Voyage
description: You're trapped on a strange ship! To escape, you must solve puzzles, explore unique rooms, meet a couple interesting characters, and uncover a mystery to figure out why you're here. Who knows, you may even stop something bad from happening along the way… Bon voyage!

name: Trouble In Paradise
description: Dive into an adventure where you unlock characters, control vehicles, and master your weapons. Solve puzzles, relax by beaches, and shop at local markets. Collect 'kilos’ for snacks and health. Enjoy retro visuals, hand-drawn cutscenes with amateur voiceovers, and a groovy original soundtrack.

name: Travel Knight Adventure
description: The Medieval Action Based RPG with guns and magic. Pirates, zombies, wizards and dragons! Catacombs full of treasure and puzzles.

name: Travel Along
description: Travel Along is a hidden object game where you collect stamps, postcards and coins while searching objects around the world!

name: Space Threat
description: Drive through beautiful locations and dangerous roads, but be careful and avoid obstacles! Be prepared for anything and prove that you can withstand any situation!

name: Sporeborn Dark
description: Break out of a labyrinth surrounded by darkness, infested with growths and filled with disgusting monsters. Explore randomly generated locations of the experimental area to find something that will help you delay your demise. Dark, atmospheric, creepy horror roguelike.

name: Starpuffs
description: Your Starpuffs are in trouble! You need to rescue them! Split and merge your way through over 100 increasingly challenging and complex levels in this cute and colourful puzzle game. Can you save all the Starpuffs?

name: Start a Startup with a Legendary Japanese Warlord
description: A short visual novel with quizzes to help you dip your toes into the world of startups.

name: Stellaris: Astral Planes
description: Includes a new core system and technologies. New planes to explore. New branching narratives.

name: Suburban Footy League
description: In a town like yours the ultimate football adventure is about to begin.

name: Suero Zeus
description: Consigue armas e items que te ayuden a abrirte camino por las regiones infectadas de monstruos sedientos de sangre, ayuda a los pobres sobrevivientes que encuentres en tu camino y encuentra la manera de resolver acertijos que dificultan tu gran escape.

name: Super Picture Cross
description: A casual and stimulating nonogram puzzle game with endless logic puzzles to solve. Uncover a huge variety of 3D objects, and discover new puzzles - never run out of fun.

name: SwapPics: Knights vs Demons
description: Swap pictures of your kingdom around to complete your buildings. Direct the Knights and soldiers from your building to fight demons and capture middle kingdom.

name: Sun Haven: Cyberpop Pack
description: This Cyberpop Pack includes 34 Cyber-inspired Clothing Items, 5 Cyber-inspired Wigs, 5 Cyber-inspired Pets, 1 Cyber-inspired Mount, and 15 different Furniture Items.

name: Sun Haven: Rock 'n' Roll Pack
description: This Rock ‘n' Roll Pack includes 29 Rock-inspired Clothing Items, 4 Rock-inspired Wigs, 1 Punk Rat Pet, 1 Punk Horse Mount, and 12 different Furniture Items.

name: Sun Haven: Trick or Treat Pack
description: This Trick or Treat Pack includes 26 spooky-themed Clothing Items, 1 Ghost Pet, 1 Ghost Mount, and 9 different spooky-themed Furniture Items.

name: Sun Haven: Spirit Petal Pack
description: This Spirit Petal Pack includes 20 fae-themed Clothing Items, 4 Fae-themed Wigs, 1 Spirit Petal Pet, 1 Spirit Koi Mount, and 9 different Furniture Items.

name: The Dollmaker
description: The Dollmaker is a first person horror game, where after being captured, you find yourself searching a mansion for a way to escape. But the Dollmaker and his creations will be searching for you, will you become a part of his collection?

name: Taimanin RPG Extasy
description: Super-popular Taimanin RPG is now available on Steam! The Taimanin take the stage in a classic turn-based RPG! Commander Skills, Formations, and Ultimate Skills... Make good use of them and be victorious! Battle alongside Taimanin whenever you want! From this day forth, you're a Taimanin!

name: Sonic Rush Adventure Flash
description: Sonic Rush Adventure Flash is a promotional browser game made to promote Sonic Rush Adventure. The game was playable on the Sonic Rush Adventure website.

name: Fallen Overlord
description:
Dare to challenge one of the hardest games ever?! Beat the 99 floors and face the king on the 100th floor!

The game includes a leaderboard for you to share your score with the whole world!

name: Hoover Dam
description: The monsters have taken over one of our most prized national landmarks. The Hoover Dam has been infested with hell-spawn and it's your job to clean house! Battle your way up and down canyon ledges and caves in this very large, very detailed level. You'll want to stop and enjoy the view as you look up at the majestic Hoover Dam. Just don't stand still too long or you'll be toast! Your final objective is to get to the top of the dam and stop the baddies before they blow it up. Are you up to the task?

name: The Bleeding Tower Of Pisa
description: Another piece of human history has been desecrated by those ruthless Hell-spawned monsters. The Bleeding Tower Of Pisa is an affront to everyone on Earth and they've called you in to set things right. First, you must find a way into the tower. Then clean up the mess, floor by floor.When you've collected the keys, and "taken out the trash," head to the basement for the final showdown. Remember: in the Bleeding Tower Of Pisa, blood will flow. Try not to let it be yours!

name: The Villa of Pain
description:
The "Villa of Pain" awaits. The monsters have infested this quaint country villa. The owners called Terminix and Orkin, but the Imps just ate the guys they sent out. Now they've called you in. You begin in the courtyard and must figure out a way into the building. Once inside, your mission is simple: destroy everything in your path.
It's time for you to clean house! And bring a mop, there'll be plenty of blood.

name: Shadows Labyrinth
description: Embark on a journey through the enigmatic realm of shadows, battling countless creatures to unveil the path towards emancipation.

name: Small World
description: This is a third person strategy adventure game.

name: Space Gun
description: Space Gun is an exciting physics puzzle game in which fun and exciting levels of varying difficulty await you. Plunge into the space age of technology and take control of a killer gun and destroy everything in your path! The game features many unique buildings and levels, so complete them all!

name: Snow Blocks 2
description: In the game you will find many levels of varying difficulty and different blocks that you have to destroy! Read the game from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles! Whether you can walk this path depends only on you!

name: Souls Survivors
description: Fight hordes of enemies, face unique bosses, learn powerful abilities, and explore a huge and diverse map. Souls Survivors combines Hack&Slash mechanics with Roguelite elements and gives you a straightforward and easy to understand yet deep and complex Action RPG game.

name: Skies Above
description: When the last Leviathan begins its dangerous escape from the planet, as the leader of a small warrior group, it's your turn to protect it from the robot army of the greedy mega-corporation.

name: Silent Depth 2: Pacific
description: Silent Depth 2: Pacific is a lite sub-sim. You enter the Silent Service at the command of a Gato class submarine on War Patrols during World War 2. How long will you survive, and ultimately how much tonnage you sink is down to skill and cunning.

name: Sex Latex
description: Sex Latex - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Sex Play: Tropical Vacation
description: A quick and dirty game made for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. Take your girlfriend on a tropical vacation and enjoy complete privacy.

name: Seeing Things
description: SEEING THINGS is full tilt surveillance horror. Keep your eyes locked on security cameras for an outrageous collection of horrific anomalies, suspicious movement, and the occasional T-Rex. Observe, detect, survive!

name: SCP: Bloodwater
description: SCP Bloodwater is a strategy management defense game inspired by the SCP Foundation's SCP-354, also known as the Red Pool. Take the role of a newly appointed Site Director at the Red Pool Containment Zone, harvest valuable organic material, and defend the facility against the Red Pool's attacks.

name: Scarlet Manor: The Heir
description: Unravel the mystery of the Scarlet Manor! Embark on a 2D point and click horror journey, solving complex puzzles and uncovering the secrets hidden behind the walls of the mansion. The Manor awaits you.

name: SaGaS
description: SaGaS is a project based on new Chinese grotesque Cthulhu theme, integrating the old Hong Kong retro style and background settings of the 20th century. It is a fan project based on Scara-Ei character shipping from Genshin Impact. The game uses puzzles and maze solving as its main gameplay.

name: Room Cleaning 2
description: Room cleaning 2 - Continuation of the first part of the game! This time you will plunge into the medieval magical world and put things in order in every room that you meet on your way! You have to try out the role of a student who has just been hired!

name: Savage Girls
description: Choose between Kelly a cyborg or Uldra a legendary warrior and fight in this classic style Beat 'em up with spicy rewards.

name: Ride 5: Short Track Pack
description: Whether on a supermotard or a scooter, push your drifts to the max on the perfect bike with Ride 5: Short Track Pack!

name: RogueMusk
description: RogueMusk is a fast-paced action shooter with a third-person view in a cybersecurity setting. While running vast distances, collect scattered particles of matter, pick up temporary upgrades and conduct targeted fire at the sentry droids. Buy upgrades for your pistol and carefully watch your step.

name: Rodent Rumble
description: Get ready to scurry and scuffle in the most adorable competition around, Rodent Rumble! Whether you are battling it out in Block Party for the Golden Acorn or testing your skills in Rodent Royale against opposing squads – this is every fluff for themselves! Are you ready to scurry to victory?

name: Rival Goals
description: Set real-life daily goals, unlock more characters, and discover the mystery behind the Space Siren who brought you all together. Drink more water, go for a run, do your homework, or anything you need! Make your dreams come true!

name: Queer Quest: All in a Gay's Work
description: There's a naked bike ride blocking the road. Ryan's selfies suck. Stevie Hix needs some tape for tucking. Oh, and your hot girlfriend is missing.

name: Princess Knight's Mission: Anna's Marvelous Adventures
description: The princess of the kingdom, Anna, received news of the resurrection of the Demon King. Despite her frustration with the demanding duties of governance, she donned the hero's attire blessed with the "Divine Blessing."

name: Project Atno
description: Forge your own path through a derelict station in this fast-paced epic adventure. Navigate the labyrinthine behemoth, form alliances with survivors, and uncover the secrets behind the mystery that befell this place.

name: Pseudo-Haunting
description: Fend off spirits by ripping your spirit off your body. Explore a glitched haunted house. Recall twisted memories. Get out alive.

name: Project Overnet
description: Project Overnet is an exhilarating and immersive digital card game where winning requires strategy and execution. Resolve the pattern challenges and harness the power of your M.I.N.D to prove yourself worthy to become the first OverKnight.

name: Paranormal Files: Trials of Worth - Collector's Edition
description: Paranormal detective Rick Rogers is on the case after two archeologists from the same expedition are found catatonic, but the real mystery has only begun!

name: Pigeon in Hurry
description: Pigeon In Hurry is a fun 3D runner about a infinitely hungry bird. Feel the free flight at low altitude. Fly around various obstacles, collect as many tacos as possible, feed the pigeon.

name: Poly
description: Simplistic roguelike shooter, Blast your way through countless enemies while earning powerful upgrades which turn you into a shape obliterating machine! 50+ upgrades with countless synergies and stacking effects!, Unique enemies which have unique abilities.

name: Matrix World
description: Welcome to the captivating world inspired by the iconic movie "The Matrix." Here, you'll find a unique blend of freedom and diversity in a virtual city that has become a symbol of this fantastic universe.

name: Lucky Dungeon
description: Delve through a series of dungeons full of terrors. Fight battles by stopping a board full of your equipment and skills. Press your luck to gain battle resources, but be careful. One bad roll and you can lose everything. This game doesn't contain any real-world currency gambling/microtransactions.

name: Legend Of Calvas: The Acurine Heart
description: Legend Of Calvas: The Acurine Heart is an action-adventure game where players harness elemental powers through Acurine shards, enhancing their abilities. Explore varied realms, battle formidable foes, and solve intricate puzzles! Embark on Calvas' journey, revealing the secrets of the Acurine Heart!

name: Last God's Bidding
description: Assume the role of a divine guardian in Last God's Bidding entrusted by a powerful god to restore balance to the planets. Make the right decisions in this turn-based resource management strategy game to recultivate planets.

name: Legacy: Witch Island 4
description: - Beautiful enchanted forest landscapes. - Several Logic mini-games - Unusual application of hog-scenes. It is possible to bypass the object search. - The plot is designed to last 5-6 hours.

name: Mądra Głowa
description: Sin descripción

name: Moonbase Lambda
description: Moonbase Lambda is a horror survival game which you have to escape from a procedurally-generated maze. The premise of the game is that an unidentified creature breaks into the moonbase, which leaves you no choice but to survive and escape from it.

name: Moonstone Island: Eerie Items DLC Pack
description: Nothing says Autumn like decorations!

name: Mycelium Guardians
description: Isometric strategy game, you command a collective of fungi in a post-apocalyptic Earth. Utilize mycelium to build structures, manage resources, and mitigate environmental threats. Your choices shape the balance between life and desolation. Engage in strategy to be Earth's final line of defense

name: Naratha
description: Naratha is a story-driven RPG with deck-building gameplay. Adventure through the world as Naratha, the beast slayer. Hunting down black beasts who plagued the land, and your journey will not be alone. Talee the bard and a little white tiger cub will go along with you!

name: No.HazedHeart
description: This game is a casual strategy game that requires players to overcome multiple challenges and connect with beautiful girls' hearts. Players need to operate the two sides of the heart and guide them to reach the destination at the same time, in order to win the heart of the girl.

name: No King No Kingdom II
description: You are the King in the first-person strategy game. Manage villagers, collect resources and build your castle. Сreate army not only of knights, but also with griffins, trolls or even mighty dragons. Mount your favorite fantasy creature and join the battle. Rise royal scepter to lead your kingdom.

name: Mycelium Heaven
description: It's a cozy yet challenging puzzle game about a mushroom that devours zombies. You'll expand, grow and consume your way through the forest using your wit and reason.

name: Omg! Not Another Isekai
description: Seo literally wakes up in the lap of a beautiful girl from another world. A world filled with sword fighting, magic spells, and legendary beasts. Follow Seo and learn more about this brand new world! Make choices that affect dialogue and the game's ending.

name: Huecube
description: Huecube is a puzzle platformer with fluid movement about shifting colours and manipulating time to reach the goal. Features an in-built level editor with Steam workshop support.

name: Inkbound: Supporter Pack - The Starship of Terrors
description: The Starship of Terrors Supporter Pack rewards your support with a wide variety of exclusive cosmetic items to customize your look. It includes armor sets, weapons, helmets, and a bundle of space-themed visual effects to enhance your journey through the world of Inkbound.

name: Inkbound: Supporter Pack - The Story Begins
description: The Story Begins Supporter Pack rewards your support with a wide variety of exclusive cosmetic items to customize your look. It includes armor sets, weapons, helmets, and plenty of fancy visual effects to spice up your dives through the books of the Inkbound world.

name: Island Ops
description: "Take a step, dive into Island Ops! Unexpected obstacles await you that secret agent Blade must overcome with his skills. Additionally, the secrets of hidden experiments and mutations lie in the depths of this story. Are you ready for this action-packed adventure?"

name: It's Kooky: Land of Aotearoa
description: Welcome to another kooky game! This time, you will explore the lands of Aotearoa and discover all the hidden quirky elements throughout the game which is full of challenges, histories and, most importantly, fun!

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Yuya Fungami
description: Hit the ground running with Yuya Fungami and snuff out your enemies with his stand Highway Go Go! Become relentless in your pursuit of victory with Yuya Fungami.

name: Knightess in Debt
description: Build your own deck and battle, as you gamble your way to freedom and love.

name: King Static
description: Whoever defeats the king shall be granted a wish. Style your way to the king's tower or die trying in this hack and slash rogue-like game with combat heavily inspired by classic character action games like DMC.

name: Horace Hagfish
description: In Horace Hagfish, players engage in a top-down puzzle game that revolves around color mixing and matching. Plan your moves to mix colors, collect orbs, and unlock the exit without generating the color brown.

name: Hiding Star
description: Single player game with puzzle elements and survival in a mysterious building, where you are chased by a mad attraction - Toothy Jack, who serves Hostess. Use Ball Gun to solve puzzles and move forward.

name: Hidden World 5 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Gem Galaxy
description: Decorate the board by stratetically placing gems to build up your highscore.

name: Fantasy Blacksmith Shop Simulator
description: Step into the enchanting world of 'Fantasy Blacksmith,' where hammers clang, furnaces roar, and raw materials transform into awe-inspiring arms. Forge your destiny today!

name: Emberville
description: Help the citizens of Emberville rebuild their town, as you rescue them from the clutches of wicked forces with the aid of a mysterious and loyal friend. Learn various crafting and combat skills as you explore the treacherous corridors of a massive, ever-changing dungeon.

name: Elements: Path of the Wizard
description: A card game where you will be responsible for the fate of an entire kingdom. Try on the role of a wise court magician, who is able to prevent a catastrophe with just a wave of his hand. At your disposal will be valuable magic items and all the existing elements.

name: Easy Red 2: Ardennes 1940 & 1944
description: Command history in Easy Red 2: Ardennes 1940 & 1944! Blitz through the early chaos of WWII's Invasion of France, then brace for the brutal winter battles of the Ardennes campaign. Will you rewrite the pages of history?

name: Exodus: Black Sun
description: Exodus: Black Sun is a satirical SciFi RTS that revives the magic of genre classics while innovating on its core conventions. You’ll wage a brutal resource war across a variety of game modes using a host of fresh mechanics that give you unparalleled control over your army’s tactics and play-style.

name: Furry Feet 2
description: The long awaited sequel to the hit "Furry Feet" is here, and improved in every conceivable way.

name: Ghost Carver
description: Ghost Carver is a futuristic racer that combines intuitive combat mechanics with exceptional agility to create a highly intense racing experience. Build massive speed with risky maneuvers, fend off other racers with advanced combat techniques, and explore your maximum potential on every track.

name: Grog
description: Grog is a First-Person, up-to-4-player online multiplayer party game where you compete against your friends in various Australian-inspired minigames to see who the greatest Aussie dad is.

name: Grey Cat
description: Grey Cat is a Side Scroller Puzzle/Adventure/Bullet-Hell game with unique Puzzle capabilities. You are to guide a Cat through a abandoned Science Facility on a mission to Escape from this Creepy place. Think about your Actions because He knows you exist.

name: Ghoul Smash
description: Ghoul Smash is a turn based physics game similar to Graffiti Smash and Monster Strike where you smash into enemies, fight bosses, and loot items. With simplistic click-and-drag controls you can experience the thrill of smashing enemies into dust while gaining dopamine fueled rewards!

name: Goob
description: Embark on an epic journey into the depths of a mysterious and treacherous underground world. This immersive adventure combines exploring vast and mysterious caves teaming with ferocious monsters, mining for precious minerals, and continuously upgrading your abilities to survive.

name: Battle Record: Graizor
description: As a war threatens to engulf the world, a small rebel army with there new mobile weapon, Graizor, may be the world's last hope for peace. Destroy enemy mechs with the combination of a sword and energy rifle on your journey to bring an end to a devastating war.

name: Back into the Coffin
description: Back into the Coffin is a 1-4 people CO-OP horror gameAs a vampire hunter in a universe terrorized by vampires, you can work alone or with your team to use various magical equipments to find the vampire's class and send it back to its coffin.

name: Alex's Hope & Alex's Solitude
description: A boy regains his hope and a girl finds herself in solitude. A kinetic novel telling the stories of two young adults overcoming their darkest days.

name: Alien Bounty
description: Alien Bounty is a Sci-fi bounty hunting RPG. Search for your targets among busy crowds, kill or capture them, and use your hard earned creds to upgrade & customize your character!

name: Dragon Bobby: The Story of a Life
description: A uniquely beautiful game with third-person exploration and puzzles that tells the story of a man's life from birth. You control a dragon who is an analogy of this man in the story. A true reflection on life.

name: Dusty Crib
description: Dusty Crib is a hidden object game. Slow gameplay will allow you to concentrate on searching and finding all the necessary things from the list to complete the level. Look more carefully as many items end up in the most unexpected places.

name: Dragon Eclipse
description: Choose your Tamer and fight dangerous creatures with the help of your companions - powerful Mystlings! Travel the mysterious world of Dragon Eclipse. Catch and train Mystlings to create your own team! Build a strong card deck and make efficient synergies of three Mystlings to fight your enemies.

name: Diari
description: Arise player, welcome to Diari! Explore the world of Ekrose with Aimacra, giving them insight as she traverses through platforming and puzzles to meet her friend Sirestias. Guided by intuition and emotion, you will shape Aimacra through her journey and how it all ends.

name: DCS World: F-16C First in Weasels Over Syria Campaign by Ground Pounder Sims
description: Strap on the mighty F-16C Viper and enter the world of the Wild Weasels! First In - Weasels Over Syria will immerse you in this legendary mission as you fly head on into the enemies air defenses.

name: DCS World: MAD Black Shark Campaign by Stone Sky
description: The principle of deterrence was founded on the notion that a nuclear attack by one superpower would be met with an overwhelming nuclear retaliation such that both the attacker and the defender would be annihilated.

name: Daemon Sigil
description: Defend your village from an eldritch invasion in this creature collector, turn-based card battler. Train your favourite characters through a Roguelite upgrades system. Assemble a formidable daemon squad and journey to an otherworldly realm to close the last portal!

name: Darkworld
description: In Darkworld, you’re a snailf living your best life in the shop of a blacksmith. Listen to his clients to learn more about their stories, do your best to clean their weapons and improve your snailf’s business in this cosy video game when even hammers are cute!

name: Hell Let Loose: Ultimate Edition
description: Enlist in the ever-expanding Hell Let Loose experience, bringing you World War II on an epic scale. With battles of 50v50 players and a dynamically shifting front line, this first-person shooter demands teamwork, communication, and strategy, not only to win but to survive!

name: Hell Let Loose: Deluxe Edition
description: Enlist in the ever-expanding Hell Let Loose experience, bringing you World War II on an epic scale. With battles of 50v50 players and a dynamically shifting front line, this first-person shooter demands teamwork, communication, and strategy, not only to win but to survive!

name: Underwater Life Bundle
description:
Running an aquarium shop is a real challenge! Clients will entrust you with difficult tasks you have to cope with. In return, a reward awaits you. Intended for business development - buying new fish, exotic plants, a store, or developing skills.

In Deadliest Catch: The Game you will compete in dangerous sea rallies to catch more crabs than you ever thought possible. The task is not simple – it is a battle against time, fishing quotas, crab migrations, and most importantly: the sea. Such is your fate on the Alaskan waters!

name: Terraformers & Moonshine Inc.: Mars and Moon Bundle
description: Explore Mars or make Moonshine, it's your choice - two games in one package!

name: Ships Simulator Bundle
description:
Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea.
Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions. Assemble massive naval installations on open waters.

Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea.
Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions. Assemble massive naval installations on open waters.

name: Weapons Factory
description: Quake II's spiritual successor to Team Fortress with jetpacks and grappling hooks; alternate classes, weapons and gadgets.

name: Weapons Factory Arena
description: Remake of Weapons Factory on the Quake III engine.

name: Enemy Territory Fortress
description: Remake of Quakeworld Team Fortress on the Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory engine.

name: Strike Force
description: Strike Force is a realistic team combat simulation in which players take the roles of either the infamous Terrorists or covert Strike Force operatives, in missions that could change the fate of the world forever. You will choose from one of 16 characters, each with his or her own special training and characteristics, and select real-life weapons and gear with which to wage war with your enemies. You will need sound tactics, quick reflexes and solid teamwork in order to prevail.

name: Strike Force 2004
description: Official followup to the tactical shooter Strike Force on the UT2004 engine. A retail release for PC and Xbox 360 named Strike Force: Red Cell was announced in 2005 only to be quietly cancelled.

name: Stop Ball
description:
The objective is to keep the spheres that appear on the screen in the air, although there will be phases in which our objective will be to avoid any contact with them.

Fun arcade from Juliet software, a company very active in the early years of 8-bit computers (creator of other titles such as Antares), which would disappear when the Golden Age came.
